message: A "Getting Started" topic of sorts, either with Convore or Como.  Convore to me is a cross of Twitter and a Forum.  Look for groups that interest you and join the conversation!
I'm going to have to check this out from my iPhone. I'm curious if this has push or not.
Nope, at least not yet. Boxcar doesn't support it yet either
Convore has a great iPhone app too, though there's no push notifications last I checked.  I call this a feature though...
